snippet: Asking Congress for more authority, Dr. Margaret A. Hamburg said her agency should have more aggressively policed pharmacies like the one behind a deadly meningitis outbreak.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration commissioner Dr Margaret A Hamburg, asking Congress for more authority, says her agency should have acted more aggressively against compounding pharmacies like one responsible for deadly meningitis outbreak.
lead_paragraph: Asking Congress for more authority, Dr. Margaret A. Hamburg said her agency should have more aggressively policed pharmacies like the one behind a deadly meningitis outbreak.

headline.main: F.D.A. Chief Concedes Need for Policing of Compounders
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Chief Concedes Need For Policing of Compounders
